name: AtherosclerosisOfTheExtremities
title: Atherosclerosis of the Extremities
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of atherosclerosis of extremities),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of Atherosclerosis of the Extremities.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
